parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: The accountId of the account that the user is using, returned in the Login response.

parameter.name: documents
parameter.description: The documents to be signed.

parameter.name: recipients
parameter.description: The email addresses of the envelope recipients.

parameter.name: emailSubject
parameter.description: The subject of the email used to send the envelope.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status of the envelope, possible values sent and created.

parameter.name: templateId
parameter.description: The ID of the template being accessed.

parameter.name: templateRoles
parameter.description: Specifies the template recipient. Each roleName in the template must have a recipient assigned to it

parameter.name: brandId
parameter.description: This sets the brand profile format used for the envelope. The value in the string is the brandId associated with the profileAccount branding must be enabled for the account to use this option.

parameter.name: emailBlurb
parameter.description: This is the same as the email body. If specified it is included in email body for all envelope recipients.

parameter.name: compositeTemplates
parameter.description: This is an json element.A complex type that can be added to create envelopes from a combination of DocuSign templates and PDF forms.

parameter.name: envelopeId
parameter.description: The ID of the envelope.

parameter.name: certificateUri
parameter.description: Retrieves a URI for an endpoint that allow you to easily retrieve certification information.

parameter.name: completedDateTime
parameter.description: Specified the date and time this item was completed.

parameter.name: createdDateTime
parameter.description: Indicates the date and time the item was created.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: This is json element.

parameter.name: customFieldsUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the custom fields.

parameter.name: declinedDateTime
parameter.description: The date and time the recipient declined the document.

parameter.name: deletedDateTime
parameter.description: Specified the date and time the item was deleted.

parameter.name: deliveredDateTime
parameter.description: This parameter reserved for DocuSign use only.

parameter.name: accessibility
parameter.description: Sets the document reading zones for screen reader application.This element can only be used if document accessibility is enabled for the account.

parameter.name: documentsUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the document.

parameter.name: emailSettings
parameter.description: This is json element for envelope email setting.

parameter.name: allowReassign
parameter.description: Booean value. When set to true, the recipient can redirect an envelope to a more appropriate recipient.

parameter.name: enableWetSign
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, the signer is allowed to print the document and sign it on paper.

parameter.name: enforceSignerVisibility
parameter.description: Boolean value. Document with tabs can only be viewed by signers that have a tab on that document.

parameter.name: allowMarkup
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, Markup is enabled for envelope. Account must have Document Markup enabled to use this.

parameter.name: envelopeIdStamping
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, Envelope ID stamping is enabled.

parameter.name: envelopeUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the envelope or envelopes.

parameter.name: eventNotification
parameter.description: This is json element.

parameter.name: is21CFRPart11
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, indicates that this module is enabled on the account.

parameter.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameter.description: The date and time the item was last modified.

parameter.name: envelopeLocks
parameter.description: This is json element.

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: The is json element.

parameter.name: messageLock
parameter.description: Boolean value. prevents senders from changing the contents of emailBlurb and emailSubject properties for the envelope.

parameter.name: notification
parameter.description: This is the json element.

parameter.name: notificationUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the notification.

parameter.name: purgeState
parameter.description: Initiates a purge request.

parameter.name: allowRecipientRecursion
parameter.description: The documents to be signed.

parameter.name: recipientsLock
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true prevents senders from changing, correcting, or deleting the recipient information for the envelope.

parameter.name: recipientsUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the recipients.

parameter.name: sentDateTime
parameter.description: The date and time the envelope was sent.

parameter.name: signingLocation
parameter.description: Specifies the physical location where the signing takes place.

parameter.name: asynchronous
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, the envelope is queued for processing and the value of the status property is set to processing.

parameter.name: statusChangedDateTime
parameter.description: The date and time the status changed.

parameter.name: authoritativeCopy
parameter.description: Boolean value, Specifies the Authoritative copy feature. If set to true the Authoritative copy feature is enable.

parameter.name: templatesUri
parameter.description: Contains a URI for an endpoint that you can use to retrieve the templates.

parameter.name: transactionId
parameter.description: Used to identify an envelope.

parameter.name: useDisclosure
parameter.description: The documents to be signed.

parameter.name: voidedDateTime
parameter.description: The date and time the envelope or template was voided.

parameter.name: voidedReason
parameter.description: The reason the envelope or template was voided.

parameter.name: cdseMode
parameter.description: Reserved for DocuSign.

parameter.name: completedDocumentsOnly
parameter.description: Reserved for DocuSign.

parameter.name: mergeRolesOnDraft
parameter.description: Boolean value. When set to true, template roles will be merged, and empty recipients will be removed.
